text: I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship.
author: Louisa May Alcott

text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken
author: Oscar Wilde

text: If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.
author: Wayne Dyer

text: The best way out is always through
author: Robert Frost

text: We choose our own path. Our values and our actions, they define who we are
author: Stefan Salvatore

text: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated
author: Maya Angelou

text: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality
author: Seneca

text: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other
author: Audrey Hepburn

text: You are allowed to be both a masterpiece and a work in progress.
author: Sophia Bush

text: Where you invest your love, you invest your life'
author: Mumford & Sons
